name: Diamond Thief 3D
description:
Now in the third dimension! Jasper took one of his old Scratch projects from 2016 and gave it new life by making it with Unity. Can you steal the diamond from the museum using only your wits, hints from posters on the walls, and somewhat realistic physics? Play and find out! Or play the original Diamond Thief 2D on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/87724962/

Features:

- Puzzles

- Jumping

- Ability to cling to walls

- Extensive use of free Unity assets

- Big money

All donations go towards Jasper's year of studying abroad in Germany :)
